name: Ghost Town Shoppe
description:
A game where you are a ghost running a store!

Place shelves by clicking "Open Editor".  Then click the location in the store you would like to place the shelf. Once placed, float over to the shelf to assign it an item type and a price, then interact by pressing "E" to stock it. Shelves will need to be restocked whenever a customer buys the item. Once a customer buys an item, they will float to the cash register. Move over to the cash register and interact with it to check out the customer.

You can pause the game and access the settings at any time by pressing the escape key. (Not while in full screen mode though)

This is just a prototype right now. I wanted to add so much more, like the ability to hire employees to stock shelves and check out customers, but I unfortunately ran out of time.

item sprites from Alexs-assets RPG Item Pack & Alexs-assets RPG Item Pack 2
